TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines constants that indicate how a is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> types to indicate the appearance of the cell when it is not in edit mode. In edit mode, the cell displays the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle ComboBox = int32(0)

Docs.summary: When it is not in edit mode, the mimics the appearance of a control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle DropDownButton = int32(1)

Docs.summary: When it is not in edit mode, the is displayed with a drop-down button but does not otherwise mimic the appearance of a control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle Nothing = int32(2)

Docs.summary: When it is not in edit mode, the is displayed without a drop-down button.
